name: 伊拉莉·布拉茜
name_full: 伊拉莉·布拉茜 Ilary Blasi

last_movies.title: 我是伊拉里：名媛新生活

introduction: When she was five years old she got her first part in the film David and David; then, at the age of six, she starred in Da grande by Franco Amurri and in Vizio di vivere by Dino Risi. Afterwards she worked in Fiori di zucca (1988) by Stefano Pomicia and La dolce casa degli orrori (1989) by Lucio Fulci.[3]After some other television programmes, she became a soubrette of Passaparola (Password). Then she started to work for RAI in programs such as Top of the Pops, CD live and Che tempo che fa.[3]In 2006 she was the co-host of Festival di Sanremo, then worked again for Mediaset in the program Festivalbar with Cristina Chiabotto.[3]From 2007 to 2010, she was working on Italia 1's hit show Le Iene with Luca Bizzarri and Paolo Kessisoglu. She also featured in Italian television commercials, advertising a popular mobile phone network operating company
